name: Sleigher
title: The Red Oath
deity: The Judge (Varkael Thrumm), Second Seat of Mada
notes: Priest of the Second Seat, a subchurch of Mada devoted to The Judge (Varkael Thrumm). Turn Undead is always available. Miracles are risky; failure may lock miracles or cause judicial/divine consequences rather than wrath. Holy symbol is a gavel, representing finality and verdict. Vampiric Curse (Narrative): Vampiric Bite—Sleigher may bite a helpless, restrained, unconscious, or willing creature. Not a standard attack. Deals 1d4 damage; Sleigher heals 1 HP OR gains advantage on his next WIS-based miracle. Each use is considered a recorded judgment and may carry moral, social, or divine consequences at the GM’s discretion.
talent2: Priest Talent (Level 2): Divine Recovery — After a rest, recover one miracle lost due to failed casting
spellsKnown: Cure Wounds (T1), Bless (T1), Hold Person (T2), Silence (T2); Turn Undead (always available)
inv1: Holy symbol (cracked gavel of the Second Seat)
